text:
A teashop owner was found murdered on Monday. Police said S. Harihara Subramanian (35) of Puliyarai was found murdered when he had come to Melapattamudaiyarpuram, his wife’s birthplace. During investigation, police found that he married Sudha of Melapattamudaiyarpuram.

As he used to torture her under the influence of alcohol, she left him to live in her father’s house. Even when he came to his father-in-law’s house on Sunday to pacify Ms. Sudha, he was in an inebriated condition and it led to a quarrel between the couple.

Against this backdrop, he was found murdered.
title: Found murdered
